Begin PlagueStart

;note that this is a placeholder script; final script will 
;set the var PlagueActivate after several days.  

float timer
short doonce


if ( GetLocked == 0 )
	if ( doonce == 0 )
		if ( OnActivate == 1 )
			set PlagueActivate to 1
			set doonce to 1
			Activate
		endif
	endif
endif


End PlagueStart
